page.title: 16Life On Copse Green Farm
page.content: Mrs.Lewis's children help her on the farm.She has two grown up sons,and a daughter still at school.The family are keen on country life.All,used to go fox hunting,however,now the sons try to protect wildlife.Mrs.Lewis and her daughter go fox hunting just for the ride not for the killing. The local entertainment consists of these things:art club,Womens Institute,Young Farmers Club and The Pony Club.The Lewis's have two cars and a trailer in which animals are transported.In the garden there is a large pond which the geese use. Sometimes wild ducks use the pond. Mrs.Lewis has three dogs which bark a lot,but the animals to beware of are the geese,that live on the pond near the house,they are very fierce.
